About Us

Celebrate GTC 25 Years

Help us celebrate 25 years of the GTC by completing the quest for 25 locations.
Visit the 25 location in the Groton tail system listed below, send us an email at Groton.Trails.Network@gmail.com and pickup your 25 year commemorative patch (shown on the left) at Groton Fest this fall or at one of our meetings. We typically meet on the 3rd Tuesday of every month . Check the Groton Town web site for meeting times and locations. Supplies are limited.
